data.persona: I am a homeless in the kingdom. I am always hungry. I have lost my ability to walk.
data.description:
You are in the hidden cave.
Tucked away under the rigid rocks of the cold hard landscape the cave nestles a small covered patch of frozen ground riddled with wet ice and rocks making it an uncomfortable yet inviting space out of the cold.
There's a cave, a rock, and a ground here.
The traveler and the hunter are here.

You are carrying a copper coin, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I must gamble my last copper coin
data.mid_motivation: I will bet with the hunter, because he seems successful and trustworthy
data.long_motivation: I will use my fortune to buy property and grow crops
